APPEARANCE.name: Yume Kuri no Suzu no Shoujo

description:
Nearly twenty years into the 21st century, people have forgotten the existence of Yokai. When a number of unexplainable phenomena plague adults of the human world with confusion and chaos, thirteen-year-old http://anidb.net/ch94472 [Mana] writes a letter to the Yokai Post in search of answers, only to be greeted by Ge Ge Ge no http://anidb.net/ch94468 [Kitarou]...
Source: crunchyroll
Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event held at Aeon Cinema Chofu on 27.03.2018.

REGULAR.description:
A forest has appeared in Shibuya`s scramble crossing. People in the city are inexplicably turning into trees. Only half believing, middle schooler Mana puts a letter in the Yokai Post, and with a clip-clop GeGeGe no Kitaro appears! After hearing Mana`s story, Kitaro and Daddy Eyeball are convinced it`s the work of a youkai who was sealed away a few hundred years ago. In order to discover the origin of the phenomenon, Kitaro and Mana head to an underground facility in the city where something lies in wait for them...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le jour du réveil des yôkai

REGULAR.description:
At the arena concert of popular idol group Batteries, several thousand attendees have disappeared! Behind the incident is BiBiBi Productions, a talent company started by Ratman. Kitaro and Cat-girl race to the scene and find Mana has just arrived there too. Kitaro tries to make Mana keep her distance, saying, "humans should not meddle in the affairs of yokai." But Mana refuses to go home, saying, "my friend has disappeared." Kitaro and the others sneak into the arena where a youkai has sucked up all the audience and swelled to an enormous size...!
Source: crunchyroll

After hearing that children are going missing all over, Mana contacts Kitaro and the others and is ready to go with them to discover the truth behind the incidents, but Kitaro turns her down, saying that humans and youkai can`t be friends. It`s soon clear that a yokai that had once been sealed away is taking children to build a yokai castle. Then, Mana is abducted. Kitaro goes to rescue Mana with the Sand-throwing Hag and the Child`s-cry Old Man!
Source: crunchyroll

Elementary schooler Yuuta, who lives next door to Mana, gets the story of Kitaro out of her and goes to the GeGeGe Forest. It`s been a few hundred years since the last time a human came to GeGeGe Forest. Kitaro tries to send Yuuta home immediately, but, pressured by the Sand-throwing Hag and Daddy Eyeball, he reluctantly allows Cat-girl to show him around the forest. Yuuta is quite knowledgable about yokai and is overjoyed to see all the different yokai in the forest. Then, suddenly, the forest changes! Kitaro and the others are attacked one by one. Daddy Eyeball says that Yuuta is the cause of it, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Taboo of the Mysterious Forest

REGULAR.description:
Lately, humans just haven`t been afraid of the yokai Kaminari. He thinks fondly of the days when people used to fear he would take their belly buttons... With all his powers going to waste, he attracts the attention of Ratman. Together with a suspicious group, Ratman starts up "BiBiBi Electric" using the electricity Kaminari creates and it`s a tremendous success! The mascot character based on Kaminari is popular, too, and Ratman chuckles to himself over a roll of banknotes, but slowly his control begins to slip...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Disaster of the Electric Yokai

REGULAR.description:
Kitaro arrives with a clip-clop in a lonely village deep in the mountains where Masae lives. The one who called Kitaro is Masae`s only son, Sho, who lives in Tokyo. Sho says that Masae is possessed by yokai, but after Sho willfully flew out of the house, she won`t listen to anything he says. But Masae`s body grows steadily weaker, and if things are left like this, it will soon be a matter of life and death. Will Kitaro be able to get rid of the yokai that clings to Masae...?
Source: crunchyroll

The president of a certain company is drinking with his subordinate at a bar. He says, "people who believe in yokai are just making excuses for their own weaknesses." Then, Kitaro appears. Kitaro tells him that yokai exist, even if he can`t see them. The company president shoves him away and leaves. The president and subordinate head home, but they get on a special train. They realize the train is headed to a different place than it usually does and look around to find that the other passengers look a little strange. The company president persists in his perspective, but terrifying things do happen in this world...
Source: crunchyroll

Mana`s class has gone to a certain village on an educational field trip. While chasing after a classmate, an old stone monument is accidentally toppled. Afterwards, the classmate falls ill and is hospitalized, and other strange things begin to happen around Mana. Sensing the presence of a huge yokai, Kitaro and the others arrive to find Mana trapped in a mirror! Could it be the work of the Old Man of the Mirrors? Why was Mana taken to the world inside the mirror? When Kitaro and the others find the Old Man of the Mirrors and question him, he attacks them using the mirrors!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 驚異! 鏡じじいの計略

REGULAR.description:
Gouhara is the president of an IT company that is short-handed due to people quitting because of the low pay and grueling hours. While he`s fretting over his troubles, he meets Ratman and the two of them join forces to start a company using kappa. The kappa who come from Toono are hard workers who can be kept on with an hourly wage of three cucumbers, which overjoys company president Gouhara. The kappa are pleased that they can work in a place where they can eat lots of cucumbers. But, soon, they begin to wonder if they`re being exploited. They rise up in revolt to claim their rights as kappa!
Source: crunchyroll

Mana goes to Cat-girl saying, "lately, creepy things have been happening at school." After learning that one of the seven wonders of Mana`s school, Hanako-san of the third floor girl`s bathroom, is a friend of Cat-girl`s, the two of them go to see Hanako, but they can`t find her. And it`s not just her. None of the yokai of the other seven wonders has been seen lately. Just then, the Sand-throwing Hag and Child`s-cry Old Man arrive, having not been able to contact their old friend Ninomiya Kinjirou. They sense someone`s presence and chase after it, all the way to the boy`s bathroom on the second floor... What is happening at the school?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 消滅! 学校の七不思議

REGULAR.description:
A second moon has appeared in the sky! It`s growing steadily closer and it`s stopped in the sky above Tokyo Bay. Meanwhile, the 808 tanuki sealed away in Japan over 200 years ago have hijacked the radio waves and announced that they will take over the Japanese government. On her way to ask Kitaro for help, Mana is captured as an anti-tanuki threat. To save Mana, Kitaro and the others head into the vast underground space where the tanuki are hiding. At the same time, the Japanese government shoots down the second moon with a missile. The huge object that falls into Tokyo Bay is actually the egg of a particular yokai... Will Kitaro be able to thwart the tanuki`s plot?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 日本征服! 八百八狸軍団

REGULAR.description:
The Japanese government has been taken over by tanuki. With anti-tanuki supporters being arrested one after another, humans have begun monitoring each others` speech and actions. Meanwhile, in order to save Kitaro who has been turned into stone by Gyoubu tanuki`s curse, Mana, Neko-girl, and the others head back underground. The Sand-throwing Hag and Child`s-cry Old Man desperately fight the tanuki army. The only one left is the human, Mana, but the curse cast on her by Gyoubu tanuki activates and her body begins to change. Yokai beasts begin destroying Japan. How will Kitaro and the others stand against this crisis?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Capital Annihilated! The Terrifying Yokai Beast
首都壊滅! 恐怖の妖怪獣

REGULAR.description:
The shop Ratman started selling dirt-cheap diamonds is thriving. When Kitaro expresses his suspicions about it, Ratman refutes him and declares he`s cutting ties with Kitaro. The truth is, Ratman has a secret partnership with the Wheel Monk. Ratman leads humans to the Wheel Monk where the Wheel Monk eats their spirits. When their spirits are consumed, the humans turn to diamonds. Selling those diamonds has made Ratman very rich and he`s indulging himself to his heart`s content. Just then, a group of humans who have lost business because of Ratman, the Diamond Syndicate, appear before him and kidnap him...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yokubou no Kongouseki! Wanyuudou no Wana
欲望の金剛石! 輪入道の罠

REGULAR.description:
Masashi, a boy who is worried by the fact that his father has fallen asleep and won`t wake up, seeks Kitaro`s help through Mana. According to Mana, lots of adults besides Masashi`s father are asleep. Daddy Eyeball speculates that the adults might be being held in the world of dreams by yokai. Kitaro and the others go to the Pillow Turner, but the Pillow Turner was not the one doing it. Mana manages to prod the Pillow Turner, and Kitaro and the others enter the world of dreams through the Pillow Turner`s arts. It`s a place where anything you imagine can become reality. Mana and Cat-girl soon become absorbed in their dream worlds.
Source: crunchyroll

Kirara, a girl who knows about the people who follow idols around, hates the way she looks and has an overwhelming desire for her face to be cuter. One day, she meets a strange old woman, the yokai Zunbera. Zunbera tells her that if she undergoes the Zunbera`s spirit surgery, she can have the beautiful face she desires. And so, Kirara undergoes the spirit surgery and becomes beautiful... but she pays a high price. Now beautiful, those around her turn jealous eyes on her, and Kirara is suddenly beset by pain. Her face peels off. She has become a Faceless!
Source: crunchyroll

Mana visits Sakaiminato where her aunt and uncle live. In order to cheer Mana up after she learns that the festival has been canceled, her uncle Shouji goes out fishing to catch her a lively fish, but he never comes back. Mana goes out on a boat with fisherman from town to search for him, and gets attacked by marine spirits on the open water. The ghost ships turn out to be Shouji and the other missing fishermen. When the boats are sunk, Mana is the only one to reach shore. Kitaro, who came to help, heads out to sea where mist from the boats rises. There, he and the marine spirits face a yokai that was supposed to have been sealed away, Umizatou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Mystery of the Tide! Umizato

REGULAR.description:
The town of Sakaiminato in the Tottori prefecture. Quietly, a strange series of events has begin. Night after night a strange monk appears to pose riddles, and those who can`t answer are turned into bronze statues. Not knowing this, Cotton Cloth, Ratman, Child`s-cry Old Man, the Plastered Wall, and Cat-girl are turned into bronze statues, one after another. In the end, even Kitaro is transformed. Just when it seems the Sand-throwing Hag will be struck down too, the monk stops, calling the Sand-throwing Hag a princess. Having narrowly avoided danger, the Sand-throwing Hag along with Daddy Eyeball and Mana head deep into the mountains seeking out help from the crow tengu!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kani Bouzu to Inishie no Nazo

REGULAR.description:
Lately, a mountain of vegetables has arrived at Kitaro`s door nearly every day. Kitaro and Daddy Eyeball are suspicious, wondering who could be behind it, but when Cat-girl shows up she says they`re just vegetables so they might as well accept them. The truth is, they`re vegetables that Cat-girl grew in an unused field she borrowed. One day, she finds a boy collapsed on the side of the road and gives him the vegetables she meant to give Kitaro. Meanwhile, Mana hears from her mother that cunning yokai have appeared near the vacation house Mana is visiting...!?
Source: crunchyroll

There is a school for ghosts and monsters. There, there are no tests or anything else. As this rumor spreads, Yuuto comes to Mana with a story about his friend saying he will become a ghost, then disappearing. Kitaro has received a lot of letters about exactly the same thing. Apparently, if you speak an incantation at the graveyard on Third Street, Fourth Street, which shouldn`t exist, appears and you can go to the ghost school. In the middle of the night, Kitaro goes to try the incantation, and another dimension appears before his eyes. As he advances deeper into the space, he finds a school where children seem to be happily taking classes. The teachers there are yokai Kitaro had already defeated. Bewildered, Kitaro becomes one of the students in order to keep an eye on things.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 復活妖怪!? おばけの学校

REGULAR.description:
One day, Mana goes with her mother, Junko, to visit her great-aunt, Yoshiko, in the hospital. Her great-aunt asks her to see if the flowers around her house are blooming. When she arrives at her great-aunt`s house, Mana is surprised by the spectacle before her. Bright red flowers bloom proudly not just in the garden, but on the roof and the walls, too. She takes a picture of the incredible flowers and sends it to Cat-girl. While Mana is listening to stories from her mother about her great-aunt when she was young, Kitaro and the others arrive. Daddy Eyeball says the flowers are youka, bewitched flowers, and that they bloom by drinking in yokai energy or spirit energy. Wanting to know why the yoka are blooming at her great-aunt`s house, Mana goes with Kitaro and the others to the place the flowers come from, an island in the south.
Source: crunchyroll

In a certain place, there was a yokai known as Takuroubi. As anything it touched burned, it lived avoiding humans and even yokai. Ratman approaches Takuroubi and proposes that he work for humanity`s sake, taking advantage of the deep loneliness that Takuroubi feels. Thus, Ratman`s attraction, BiBiBi Fire, becomes a big hit. Takuroubi was ordered to never leave his room at night, but one evening, unable to stand the boredom, he goes out. He meets a mysterious robot, Pig. Takuroubi and Pig hit it off immediately, and their friendship quickly deepens, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Flame On! The Solitude of the Takuro-Bi
炎上! たくろう火の孤独

REGULAR.description:
Mana and Cat-girl visit a certain island known as a tourist spot. At the same time, Ratman arrives on the same island with the production crew of a TV show about bizarre and scary stories and the talent starring in the show. There is a legend on this island of a terrifying yokai called Gyuuki, but the talent doesn`t believe in old stories like that, and moves the stone where Gyuuki was sealed, releasing him. The is suddenly beset with pain, and transforms into Gyuuki even as they watch. He lays waste to the town in his struggles and eats Ratman. Cat-girl and the others are in danger. Kitaro appears and confronts Gyuuki. Then, when it seems that Kitaro has completely defeated Gyuuki...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 暴走!! 最恐妖怪牛鬼

REGULAR.description:
In 1968, a certain apartment building was constructed. But, in spite of the fact that it was a brand-new building, three yokai took up residence. One by one, the human residents flee in terror. Bewildered, the married couple who own the apartments put a letter in the yokai post... In the present day, the couple`s grandchild Natsumi is the only one living in the old apartments. Just when Natsumi decides to have the apartments demolished and move somewhere new with her fiancée, Kitaro arrives. He asks Natsumi to rethink her decision to have the apartments torn down and starts telling her the history surrounding the building.
Source: crunchyroll

One day, a violent earthquake races through GeGeGe Forest. Ratman announces that he`s going to get married. Kitaro and the others remain dubious even as the arrive at the place where the wedding is to be held. There, they find Ratman in a tuxedo, in a very good mood, and, contrary to expectation, the beautiful bride, Youko. Astonished, Kitaro and the others wish Ratman every happiness. But after that event, all communication from Ratman has ceased. Worried for Ratman, the Sand-throwing Hag and the others set out looking for him. Before long, the discover Ratman, disheartened and emaciated, in the city. It seems that Youko disappeared during their honeymoon. Ratman has been the victim of marriage fraud!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nezumi Otoko Shissou!? Sekiyou no Wana
ねずみ男失踪!? 石妖の罠

REGULAR.description:
Without thinking too much of it, Mana downloads a curse app and inputs the name of a classmate. The person she cursed suffers a slight injury and a creepy notification from the app appears on Mana`s phone saying that if she doesn`t input another name within three hours, the curse will return. The curse app spreads quickly among people, and soon Mana receives notification that she`s been cursed. As the curses on the people in the city increase, hair begins to grow from the cracks in Mana`s cell phone case... Will Mana be able to break the chain of curses?!
Source: crunchyroll

Because of her mother`s unrelenting training, high schooler Yuuna can`t date anyone even if she does fall for a boy. Yuuna`s mother was betrayed by her husband, leading to divorce, and the experience has left her unable to trust anyone male. One day, Yuuna`s mother sees Yuuna with a boy she`s been friends with since childhood. Yuuna falls into a depression after her mother scolds her for the "dirty" association. Just then, the Child`s-cry Old Man, happens to pass by and drops a scroll. The scroll depicts an extraordinarily beautiful young man, and Yuuna finds herself entranced by the image. Then, the boy comes out of the painting into the real world!!
Source: crunchyroll

A large number of displaced yokai have arrived in GeGeGe Forest. Starting with Miminaga, Kitaro and the others welcome them all into the forest. After receiving a bag of jewels, Ratman is very pleased. One day, one of the jewels bursts with light and a young witch, a girl of wind, appears. When Kitaro tries to ask who the girl is, a man suddenly appears from another direction. When Miminaga and the others see the man, they tremble in fear. The man is from the gang that destroyed their country. Miminaga and the others throw themselves at him, but they are all cruelly slaughtered. Enraged, Kitaro and the others challenge the man, but they fall one by one!!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 襲来! バックベアード軍団

REGULAR.description:
Help me destroy the ring to stop the Brigadoon Project. Agnes asks for Kitaro`s help without any further explanation. Kitaro fires his finger gun as he`s told, but no matter how many times he shoots, he can`t even scratch the strange ring. Frustrated, Agnes uses magic to push Kitaro`s spirit power beyond his limits. Unable to withstand the overflowing power, Kitaro struggles, but uses all his might to fire his finger gun. He thought that this time, the ring would be shattered, ut the witch Adele snatches it away just in time. Blackbeard`s men attack GeGeGe Forest again!
Source: crunchyroll

After activating the Brigadoon Project, Blackbeard plans to make humans slaves to yokai and rule over them. In order to stop this, Agnes hurries to the city after feeling a response from the ring. She flies through the sky on her broom, careless of human gazes, and when people spot her it causes pandemonium. Seeing the chaos, Kitaro is disgusted, but Mana, who happened to be at the scene, becomes interested in Agmes. Caught up in Mana`s assertive pace, Agnes ends up staying at her house. Though she appreciates the moment of peace, Agnes leaves Mana`s house before dawn. Then, the European yokai Victor appears...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 狂気のフランケンシュタイン

REGULAR.description:
The city is alive with Halloween celebrations. Mana invites Cat-girl to a Halloween event, and the two of them visit an old movie theater. The movie they go to see is a horror film. They put on their VR goggles and wait for it to start. But the truth is the event was organized by one of the leaders of the European yokai, Camilla. Mana and Cat-girl notice that something seems wrong and take off their goggles. All around them are people who have been turned to vampires, and they find themselves under attack. Meanwhile, Kitaro and Agnes, who have gone into the city looking for the ring, notice something strange going on at the theater, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 吸血鬼のハロウィンパーティー

REGULAR.description:
On a certain riverbank live three youkai - Adzuki-washer, Adzuki-weigher, and the Adzuki Hag. In the modern age, where no one even touches adzuki beans, no one notices them. As the three of them try to think of ways to suppress the popularity of Western sweets and bring back adzuki, Ratman happens by. He sees it as a way to make lots of money, and suggests that they should become popular on streaming video sites so that they can promote adzuki. The videos of the three, produced by Ratman, become super popular and Ratman is overjoyed. However, the three youkai start arguing about the best way to show their love for adzuki, and their friendship begins to crumble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Azuki Arai Azuki Hakari Azuki Babaa
小豆洗い小豆はかり小豆婆

REGULAR.description:
Agnes is distraught over not being able to find the ring. Mana happens by. Seeing her glum expression, Mana takes Agnes to her beloved Sakaiminato to cheer her up. There, they run into Kojirou, the karasu-tengu. In the middle of their reunion, Agnes senses the presence of the ring nearby and flies off. Left alone with Mana, Kojirou tries to show off by demonstrating his ability to call up gale winds, but in doing so, he accidentally destroys the mound that had sealed away the terrifying demon Belial. With his powers restored, the demon Belial roars and sets out to take his revenge on the old karasu-tengu who sealed him away!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 悪魔ベリアル 百年の怨嗟

REGULAR.description:
Kitaro and the others are visiting a certain mansion deep in the mountains. According to the letter they received in the youkai post, a girl named Yayoi is being targeted by the youkai Hakusanbou. The Sand-throwing Hag sets a youkai repelling barrier around Yayoi and prepares for attack. But when Hakusanbou appears, he shows no intention of attacking. He hasn`t come to eat Yayoi, he`s come to take her for his bride. While Kitarou and Hakusanbou talk, Yayoi is suddenly stricken with pain. Somehow, the Ring of Arcana has appeared in her body. Sensing the manifestation of the ring, Adele appears and kidnaps Yayoi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kitsune no Yomeiri to Hakusan Bou

REGULAR.description:
A notice of a pleasure trip has been posted in a corner of GeGeGe Forest. The youkai read it with great anticipation. But when Child`s-cry Old Man goes missing, the trip is cancelled. When everyone goes looking for him, Sand-throwing Hag, the Plastered Wall, Cotton Cloth, and Cat-girl go missing one by one. Believing it to be the work of the European youkai, everyone heads to Kitaro`s house, with Ratman in the lead. The mob starts chanting for Agnes to be thrown out of Japan, and Agnes, who happens to be there, goes flying off...!?
Source: crunchyroll

After saying goodbye to Kitaro, Agnes frets alone at the edge of the pond. That`s when Mana appears. The pond is where Agnes and Mana talked and had lunch the day they first met. Slowly, Agnes begins to talk to Mana. She talks about her mother and older sister Adele, and about Backbeard`s Brigadoon project. Meanwhile, Adele is at Backbeard`s castle thinking back on her mother and little sister. She arrives at a certain determination. For the honor of her family of witches, and for Agnes, she must...!?
Source: crunchyroll

The Ring of Arcana has appeared. Knowing that its manifestation means the European yokai will be coming again, Kitaro, Agnes, and the others search desperately for the ring. But it`s Mana who finds the ring, just by chance. Not knowing it`s the Ring of Arcana, she puts it on her finger. When she realizes she can`t take it off, she panics. Kitaro clashes with Adele so that Mana can get away. As Mana tries to escape, she`s attacked by Wolfgang, then Victor, then Camilla, and Child`s-cry Old Man, the Plastered Wall, and Cat-girl step in to cover her. The struggle for the ring intensifies and sweeps Mana up in its wake!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Transform All Japanese Yokai Project

REGULAR.description:
Miraculously, Mana has survived. As she looks around, she sees the place swarming with humans who have been turned into youkai by the Brigadoon project. Knowing that the Brigadoon project must be stopped at all costs, Mana heads toward the pillar of light rising into the sky. Agnes ended up triggering Brigadoon. Adele is gravely wounded. What will the fate of these two witches be?! And, Kitaro has healed after taking Backbeard`s attack. Will he be able to defeat Backbeard?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 決戦!! バックベアード

REGULAR.description:
On her way home from her first shrine visit of the year, Mana spots a youkai dragging a dead body. Daddy Eyeball says it might have been a youkai called Kasha. It prefers to eat dead bodies, so it used to run rampant, appearing near crematoriums to steal human corpses... But the youkai Mana saw had been weak, and when it noticed Mana, it had dropped the corpse and run away. Maybe Kasha had grown weaker with age... Ratman overhears this conversation with Daddy Eyeball and hatches a sinister plot...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 新春食人奇譚 火車

REGULAR.description:
At a certain cafe, Cat-girl and Mana chat with Yuki, a snow woman. Yuki says she`s grown close to a human man named Shun. Shun comes to pick Yuki up. Taken aback by Shun`s overwhelming personality, Cat-girl and Mana wish Yuki the best in a daze. But Yuki and Shun end up fighting because of differences between the ways humans and youkai live. Yuki goes to Cat-girl and Mana again to ask for advice. Meanwhile, Shun ends up asking Ratman, who has started yet another shady business, for advice, which sends things in a strange direction...
Source: crunchyroll

Poor-man Isamu is a comedian with zero popularity. When he gets up on stage to do his material, it never gets any laughs, and his slump drags on. One day, on his way home, he hears a voice that seems to be calling him. He heads to the riverbank where he finds the youkai Sara-kozou happily singing and washing plates. He watches, unnoticed, and decides to make what he sees into a gag for his act. And so, by singing the youkai`s song and dancing, Isamu starts to become popular. Sara-kozou is enraged when he realizes his song has been stolen. Kitaro goes to warn Isamu to stop singing the song, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 終極の譚歌 さら小僧

REGULAR.description:
Inside a closed shoe shop, an old man named Isao packs up to move away. Isao and his family sort through their things, getting rid of what they don`t need. Later, something jumps out of a bag thrown out as garbage - Bake-zouri and other tsukumo-gami. They are in shock after being discarded by their owner. Just then, Ratman happens by. He sees an opportunity to make a lot of money, and incites Bake-zouri and the others to go scare those humans who don`t take good care of their things. A while later, Kitaro receives a letter saying that things have started moving around on their own, and sets out to investigate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 怪事! 化け草履の乱

REGULAR.description:
One day, while Kitaro is relaxing at home, Kojirou and a group of his fellow karasu-tengu appear. Ignoring Kitaro`s greetings, Kojirou informs him he`s being arrested for the crime of eradication and takes him away. Kitaro`s family is shocked when they hear of the unfair arrest, but it is decided that everything will be made clear in court. Thus, the Great Youkai Court was called into session. But, for some reason, the Sand-throwing Hag is nowhere to be seen. Instead, Cat-girl stands as defense. The witness, Yobuko, says she saw Kitaro kill a one-eyed goblin. As evidence, she submits a lure and geta. On top of which, the prosecution presents Mana as a witness...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momon-jii`s Scheme: The Great Yokai Trial
Momonjii no Kankei: Youkai Dai Saiban
百々爺の姦計 妖怪大裁判

REGULAR.description:
In town, blood-sucking incidents are growing frequent. As Kitaro investigates, he receives a letter. The sender wants to be killed. Kitaro goes to visit the sender and meets Onozaki, a genetics researcher. Onozaki has created immortal cells and conducted an experiment where he injected himself with them. As a result, he has obtained an immortal body and also turned into a youkai. When he transformed into a youkai, he lost control and went seeking blood. All the recent blood-sucking incidents were Onozaki`s doing. Because of the immortal cells, Onozaki can`t kill himself, so he begs Kitaro to kill him, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 永遠の命おどろおどろ

REGULAR.description:
Kitajima Atsuhi, a member of the idol unit Paradise, which is experiencing a surge in popularity, is tired of playing the shallow party boy character the president of the production company told him to play. Atsushi`s one source of support is Go Go Manjirou, a friend he met online and has never seen in person. Atsushi sends Go Go Manjirou a message saying he wants to meet. After receiving the message, Go Go Manjirou rushes over to Kitaro`s place. The truth is that Go Go Manjirou is a Faceless youkai, Nopperabou. Nopperabou asks Kitaro to meet Atsushi in his place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: なりすましのっぺらぼう

REGULAR.description:
Having received a letter saying "We are being attacked by the youkai Mannendake," Kitaro travels to a bamboo grove deep in the mountains. The owners of the bamboo grove, a married couple, Masahiko and Kiyomi, Kubota from the tourism association, and Ratman are waiting for him. They wanted to turn the bamboo grove into a tourist spot, but they say that the former owner of the grove, Daikichi, as well as others, have gone missing. As soon as Kitaro steps foot in the grove, he senses youkai energy. A warning to humans is written in blood in the grove, but the study in Daikichi`s mansion within the grove is full of bamboo leaves... Suddenly, Masahiko falls silent. When they turn to look, Masahiko has been turned to bamboo...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinsou wa Mannen Take no Yabu no Naka
The Truth Lies in the Thicket of the Mannen-dake
真相は万年竹の藪の中

REGULAR.description:
One day after school, Mana and her friends look at the Hina dolls displayed in the hallway. It`s a seven-tiered stand, but only the Emperor and Empress are displayed. According to Kotani, the teacher who bought the set, the rest of the dolls will be delivered later. Mana suddenly remembers she`s forgotten something, and heads for the classroom, leaving her friends waiting for her. But, when she gets back, her friends are gone. With no other choice, she heads home alone, but she learns that none of the friends she was going to walk home with made it to their houses. Mana has a bad feeling about it and, after contacting Kitaro, heads to the school. Once on campus, Mana realizes the number of Hina dolls has increased...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 呪いのひな祭 麻桶毛

REGULAR.description:
One day, on her way home from school, Mana talks with her friends about how a new social networking app, Omega Talk, has gotten popular. On the app, the videos on Charatomi`s yokai channel are super popular. Mana is happy to hear her friends describe youkai as cute. Meanwhile, Kitaro is looking for a youkai said to be stealing babies. Kitaro uses Child`s-cry Old Man as a lure, and waits. The youkai Ubume appears and kidnaps Child`s-cry Old Man. Kitaro hops on Cotton Cloth`s back and chases Ubume. Little do they know, the chase is being broadcast on the youkai channel...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 赤子さらいの姑獲鳥[うぶめ]

REGULAR.description:
Mana uses her power to obliterate Cat-girl body and spirit. Footage of it is broadcast and the antagonism between youkai and humans intensifies. Both sides carry resentments, and as they each seek to destroy the other, Kitaro seeks out Mana to learn the truth of things. Meanwhile, Mana hears about her bloodline and her maternal great-grandmother. It was that great-grandmother who gave her her name, and she also had the same kind of connection to the unseen world. Kitaro appears. Mana`s rage over her mother`s hurt and Kitaro`s rage over Cat-girl`s obliteration clash. What will happen to these two who stand in the space between humans and youkai...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Void of Despair and Darkness

REGULAR.description:
The final character is written and Mana is complete as a vessel. Nanashi, who is using Mana, has obtained unimaginable power. With that power, both human and youkai alike are dragged to oblivion. Unable to fight it, humans and youkai fall victim one after another. Kitaro is unable to do anything in the face of such overwhelming power. Daddy Eyeball protects him and is swallowed by oblivion as a result. Completely at a loss, Kitaro simply stands there in a daze. Ratman appears, raises his fist, and knocks Kitaro flying.
Source: crunchyroll

An abandoned town in north-east Japan. When night falls there, eerie black clouds rise and from them resounds a terrifying cry. Everyone who hears it falls ill and becomes unable to move. Kitaro receives a letter from Kanji, a boy who lives there, and heads for the town immediately. A mysterious man watches Kitaro from afar...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 地獄からの使者 鵺

REGULAR.description:
The Nue which had appeared in Touhoku was a fake, a tanuki transformed. Kitaro hurries back, but the Nue raises its ominous cry in Tokyo. The secret agreement Kitaro made with King Enma for Cat-girl`s resurrection is revealed to the Sand-throwing Hag and the others - to capture the Four Generals of Betrayal who have escaped from Hell. If he fails, Cat-girl must return to Hell, and Kitaro`s spirit will be bound there forever. The Nue appears in Tokyo again, and Kitaro goes to confront it. Will Kitaro be able to capture the Nue? What is the Way of the Demon Society, and what is the aim of the mysterious boy, Rei?!
Source: crunchyroll

Mana`s friend Miyabi has quarreled with her mother over something trivial. When she wishes she could go back to when she was little, she suddenly finds herself lost in a forest. There live mysterious children, forest spirits, the Kinoko. They invite Miyabi to play, and Miyabi innocently joins them. In the Kinoko forest, there are no adults, no school. It`s a world with nothing to tie her down. Miyabi begins to wish she never had to leave. But, slowly, Miyabi`s mind and body mature while the Kinoko around her stay the same, leaving her baffled. That`s when Kitaro appears after receiving a request from Mana. Will Miyabi return to her old world, or will she stay in the forest?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Runaway Girl! The Forest of the Kinoko
Shoujo Shissou! Ki no Ko no Mori
少女失踪! 木の子の森

REGULAR.description:
Charatomi was once well-known as a U-tuber, but his job hunting isn`t going well. He makes a comeback as a U-tuber in an attempt to escape from his job search. He meets Nuke-kubi, a youkai who has no doubt about his popularity. Zeroing in on his ability to create bursts of hot and cold air, Charatomi partners with him to stream videos. In a flash, the two become popular. Charatomi schemes to reach even greater heights of popularity, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 自己愛暴発! ぬけ首危機一髪

REGULAR.description:
The youkai Dorotabou appears at the construction site of Mega Solar, attacking the construction workers one after another. Thirty years earlier a string of the same events occurred on the same site. Plans to remove the rice fields to build a golf course caused Dorotabou to run rampant. Back then, Kitaro defeated Dorotabou after a hard fight. When Kitaro heads to the construction site to issue a warning, he runs into the company president, Kurosu.
Source: crunchyroll

Ever since Hihi, the youkai, learned tennis from a human, he`s been enraptured. An athlete he trained even reached fourth in the world. Bored with training monkeys to play, Hihi decides to train an athlete to win the gold medal at the next Olympic games. Excited, he heads into town and runs across Mana`s friend Yuumi. The two hit it off, and right away start intense daily training, but soon crack begin to appear in their relationship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 狒々のハラスメント地獄

REGULAR.description:
A suspicious man playing a guitar offers to form an alliance with Ratman. His name is Vampire Elite. He is a youkai who only targets boys who will one day serve as pillars of the country, turning them into his servants and returning them to society so that he can control the world from the shadows. He plans to turn Kitaro into his servant to prevent Kitaro from interfering with his scheme. Dazzled by the exorbitant reward, Ratman agrees to help, but...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Bewitching Melody Elite the Vampire
魅惑の旋律吸血鬼エリート

REGULAR.description:
In town, there have been a series of incidents where young women have had all the blood drained from their body while they are still alive. Kitaro can`t believe it could possibly be another vampire, and if it is, he wonders why vampires keep appearing. Then he learns from the witch Agnes, a European youkai, that Backbeard made use of lifeblood and there are signs of his resurrection. That`s why all the blood-draining youkai are trying to gather blood. She also hints that a vampire even stronger than Vampire Elite, la Seine, might have come to Japan. Kitaro is convinced that he is the one behind the recent incidents and goes to investigate. Who is this vampire la Seine?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 鮮血の貴公子 ラ・セーヌ

REGULAR.description:
To investigate a shipwreck, Kitaro visits a port city alone, but none of the residents will talk to him. Kitaro pushes ahead with his investigation, but Ratman`s betrayal causes him to be caught by a giant squid. Merpeople appear! The shipwreck was their doing. Kitaro fights desperately, but the merpeople use deep sea youkai techniques to change their form and...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 半魚人のかまぼこ奇談

REGULAR.description:
Kitaro and Cat-girl investigate a case after receiving a request from a young man who`s lover disappeared exactly two weeks ago. Strangely, there have been a number of disappearances in town. Kitaro is convinced that the string of incidents are the work of a youkai. After receiving a warning from Cat-girl, Mana discovers a strange rule in the disappearances. That night, Mana receives a message from Miyabi saying, "help me." Mana races to Miyabi`s house and cautiously heads inside...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onna Youkai: Ushirogami to no Yakusoku
Promise to the Female Yokai Ushirogami
女妖怪・後神との約束

REGULAR.description:
Mana has gone camping with Souma, Hiroto, Yuuta, and their father Yuuichi. Though Souma and Hiroto`s horseplay is exasperating, Mana enjoys her holiday. But that night, Yuuichi suddenly disappears. When Souma and Hiroto go looking for him, they are attacked and kidnapped. As an eerie laugh echoes through the space, Mana and Yuuta wonder if it might be the work of a youkai. They hurry to tell Kitaro, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 漆黒の冷気 妖怪ぶるぶる

REGULAR.description:
One night, Nickel Kana, of idol group the Batteries, meets Tofu-kozou. Kana is surprised, but he`s a weak youkai that can only carry tofu around. When Tofu-kozou asks, Kana tells him exactly why she`s working as an idol. "It`s not like it`s enough if I just carry tofu around like you do," says Kana as she leaves. The next day, Tofu-kozou appears before Kana again. Seeing that carrying tofu is Tofu-kozou`s duty, Kana begins to wonder what her own role is. Tofu-kozou says he`ll help her look and becomes her manager, but...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 豆腐小僧のカビパンデミック

REGULAR.description:
When Mana visits GeGeGe Forest, she finds Kitaro and Ratman arguing over something trivial. They each declare for the I-don`t-know-how-many-th time that they`re cutting ties with each other. Meanwhile, in town, the water has been contaminated sending everyone running around looking for drinking water. No one knows why the water is polluted, and no attempts at purifying it work. Kitaro believes that the one behind the pollution incident is one of the Four Generals of Betrayal. Kitaro begins an investigation, but doesn`t know how to stop the pollution of the water. Meanwhile, a survivor of the Way of the Demon Society, Isurugi Rei, begins to move again...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku no Yon Shou: Kuro Bouzu no Wana
The Four Generals of the Underworld: Kurobozu`s Trap
地獄の四将 黒坊主の罠

REGULAR.description:
On Tanabata, after receiving a letter from Ratman, Kitaro and the others visit a bamboo forest. In the strange bamboo forest where the bamboo flowers bloom in disarray, they get separated from the Plastered Wall. As they worry, Kitaro and the others spot a girl who is all alone. The girl attacks them and warns them to get out of the forest before leaving. Meanwhile, separated from Kitaro and injured, the Plastered Wall can`t move. That same girl passes by. She intends to attack the Plastered Wall the same way she did Kitaro and the others, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Star Festival of Love: The Youkai Flower

REGULAR.description:
The bankruptcy of the company her husband worked at causes Shouko and her family to move to a new town, but that town is controlled by the family of the president of Onikubo Foods. Her husband is forced to do work he isn`t used to and is constantly yelled at by the president of the company. Her son is bullied by the son of the president and his lackeys. Shouko herself is tormented by the president`s wife, and before they know it, their family stops smiling. One day, One day, Shouko heads to the Women`s Society. There, in front of a crowd of people, she is criticized for being late, and forced to kneel and apologize. She screams in hatred and rage, and, as if in reply, Suiko appears. "I have come to keep my promise," says Suiko, and Shouko responds by...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Suiko ga Utsusu: Kokoro no Yami
The Heart`s Darkness: The Suiko Reflects
水虎が映す 心の闇

REGULAR.description:
Mana, Kitaro, and the others visit Tottori for the first time in a long time, and learn the shocking truth that Tottori has become the Great Tottori Empire and has become an independent nation. Then, they are sent to a rehabilitation facility for the crime of saying a certain phrase, slandering Tottori. Meanwhile, Mana`s uncle, Shouji, suspects that the governor is a fake. The governor senses his doubt and has him arrested as a traitor. After escaping, Mana and the others hear from Shouji about the governor being a fake. The governor extends his evil influence. The Special Assassination Squad, Kani-tarou and Nashi-tarou, close in on Mana and Shouji! Kitaro and the others are...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kenkoku!? Ma Neko no Ootottori Teikoku
Nation Founding?! Mabyo`s Great Tottori Empire
建国!? 魔猫の大鳥取帝国

REGULAR.description:
Kitaro and the others celebrate the fishing festival with everyone from Sakaiminato. Then, Mana hears a strange voice calling her and disappears. At the same time, the door to the hidden village of Yumigahama opens. The voice calling to Mana leads her across a bridge and through that door. When she regains her senses, Mana is in a place overgrown with beautiful flowers. There, she meets children dressed in Japanese clothes. The boy who leads them, Ichinoshin, tells her she can`t return from that place. He also tells her that they are from the second year of Bunsei, which means they`re children from the Edo era. Will Kitaro and the others be able to find Mana? And what about the children...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Shinigami and Sakaiminato`s Hidden Village

REGULAR.description:
College student Christine Minato is very popular on social media with over a million followers. She uploads photos and videos that make everyone around her jealous. But a man from the Jomon era that Ratman has brought to the city begins to threaten her position. Chris asks Kitaro for help, but he declines because it isn`t a youkai. Panicked, She tries all kinds of things to battle the Jomon man. Her actions go too far, causing a societal issue. Those around her start distancing themselves. Having lost her friends, her money, even her standing in social media, Chris` hatred towards the Jomon man grows...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Social Media Addict Versus the Jomon Man

REGULAR.description:
On the run after robbing a convenience store, Kakeru happens upon a strange bus. To escape the police, he reluctantly boards the bus and asks where it`s headed. The driver simply replies, "to the place you are meant to go." The bus ends up somewhere so eerie it hardly seems part of our world. Frightened by the scene, Kakeru speaks to one of the passengers who tells him, "we have been chosen to be sent to Hell while still living." Overwhelmed by terror, Kakeru tries to stop the bus, but the bus doesn`t stop. In a frenzy, Kakeru jumps out a window of the bus, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Capital Punishment! Exiled to the Underworld

REGULAR.description:
When he learns that Mana and Isurugi Rei have met, Kitaro grows even more wary. On the way back from GeGeGe Forest, one of the Four Generals of Betrayal, Kidou, Ibukimaru, appears before Mana and Cat-girl. He calls Mana a vessel and kidnaps her. Kitaro starts searching for her immediately, but, unfortunately, requests start pouring in. All of them are about the ghost of a headless woman appearing at the dam. Kitaro asks Kagami-jiji and the others to handle Mana`s case for a little while and heads to the dam, but when he gets there he`s attacked by Ibukimaru. Then, Rei shows up...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: General of the Underworld: The Kido, Ibukimaru
地獄の四将 鬼童伊吹丸

REGULAR.description:
On the mountains where no one can enter lives a god called Taitanbou-sama. The watchman of the mountains has the duty of going to the sacred rock every four days and praying that no one other than the villagers may enter the mountains. It is said that if the watchman ever shirks in this duty, a terrible curse will befall the village. The Agata family has served as watchmen, but Kenta, born into that family, tries to break the sacred rock in an attempt to escape his duty. He and his friends try to go into the mountains, but Kitaro and his father stop them. That night, undeterred, Kenta goes to try to break the stone again, but Kitaro appears and warns him of the curse. What is the truth Kitaro speaks of events from 13 years ago...?!
Source: crunchyroll

Lately, Karakasa has grown jealous of the beautiful, modern umbrellas. One rainy day, Karakasa goes into town with Ratman and sees a young man take the wrong plastic umbrella. Thinking it a dire situation, Karakasa picks up his umbrella and chases after him, but finds the umbrella the young man picked up forgotten along the way. After many twists and turns, Karakasa manages to return the umbrellas to the young man, but the next day, he discards both of them. Karakasa is hurt by his careless treatment of the umbrellas, and thinks up a plan to beat some character into the young man...!?
Source: crunchyroll

Cat-girl takes some of her home-cooked food to Kitaro`s house, but ends up disappointed to find him not at home. He`s gone out to gather mushrooms with Child`s-cry Old Man. The youkai Iyami appears and blows a pink breath at Child`s-cry Old Man. Kitaro goes on guard when he sees Child`s-cry Old Man spacing out, but he gets hit with the breath the same way. Meanwhile, at Kitaro`s house, Cat-girl is sharing the food she brought with the Sand-throwing Hag. Kitaro returns and suddenly takes Cat-girl`s hand, inviting her on a date. Surprised by the unexpected turn of events, Cat-girl accepts the invitation, but...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iyami the Yokai`s Great Love Project
妖怪いやみの色ボケ大作戦

REGULAR.description:
A rumor silently spreads on the internet, that Yamata no Orochi on Mount Oguro with grant any 8 wishes. Hearing this, Kitaro goes to hear the details from Yobuko, who knows everything that goes on in the mountains. Meanwhile, Saitou, who laments his terrible luck, hears the rumor. He immediately heads for Mount Oguro where he meets the uncanny Yobuko. When Yobuko hears that Saitou wants to meet Yamato no Orochi, she passes him a large diamond. It begins to shine brightly, and before he knows it, Saitou is sealed inside it. Face-to-face with the enormous Yamato no Orochi, Saitou tries desperately to run away. Then, Yamato no Orochi...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 欲望のヤマタノオロチ

REGULAR.description:
King Enma demands that Kitaro apprehend the nine-tailed fox, Tamamo-no-mae. The spirits of the Four Generals of Betrayal are necessary to maintain the balance of spiritual energy in Hell. There can be no more delay. Amidst all this, the Plastered Wall and Child`s-cry Old Man haven`t returned from trying to resolve the request that came in a letter, and the Sand-throwing Hag, who went to look for them, has disappeared too... Meanwhile, a battleship approaches a certain area of Japan. Behind these events, a beautiful, eerie woman is pulling the strings...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku Houkai!? Tamamo no Mae no Wana
The Fall of the Underworld?! Tamamo-no-Mae`s Trap
地獄崩壊!? 玉藻前の罠

REGULAR.description:
Chasing the last of the Four Generals of Betrayal, Tamamo-no-mae, Kitaro finally comes face-to-face with her in Hell. But, Tamamo-no-mae disappears without settling things with Kitaro and the others. Kitaro wants to chase after her right away, but Isurugi Rei stands in his way. Rei desires even more power, and attacks Kitaro! As Hell begins to crumble, will Kitaro be able to defeat Rei and capture Tamamo-no-mae?!
Source: crunchyroll

The efforts of Kitaro and the others has lead to the fall of Tamamo-no-mae, and all Four Generals of Betrayal have been sealed away. A time of peace descends, but Kitaro`s expression stays troubled. No one knows who released the Four Generals, not even King Enma. All that`s known is that a red-faced youkai was seen at the scene. Requests from youkai to Kitaro come fluttering in. Kitaro and the others head to a mountain where plans for a golf course are moving ahead. Kitaro and the others stand against the destruction of the ground and the homes of the youkai. Meanwhile, a shadow moves in the darkness behind this incident... Who could it be?!
Source: crunchyroll

Kitaro begins to wonder if it was Nurarihyon who released the Four Generals. In his plan to restore the power of youkai, he uses brute force, and Kitaro steels his vigilance against him. Meanwhile, Shu-no-bon releases the seal on a certain mound. Nurarihyon is moving again. Kitaro receives a request to look into a town where people are disappearing one after another and heads there with Cat-girl. When they arrive, they find no people, only cats. Finding both the state of the town and the fact that their client doesn`t appear suspicious, Kitaro and the others spot a huge cat youkai and follow it into a cave. What they see there is...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ningen Soushitsu! Neko Sennin no Fukushuu
人間消失! 猫仙人の復讐

REGULAR.description:
Kitaro receives a request from a photographer named Kunou who says he`s being haunted by a ghost. That night, Kitaro accompanies him to where he`s supposed to meet someone, and the ghost of a woman swoops down on Kunou. Kitaro dodges the attack and sees that the ghost is a youkai that attached itself to a corpse, a mouryou. When he asks if the Kunou knew the woman whose corpse the mouryou has possessed, Kunou shakes his head in denial. Suspicious of his reaction, Kitaro searches for the truth, heading to Mukuromura where the mouryou lives. Who was the dead woman? And why is the mouryou attacking Kunou?!
Source: crunchyroll

As the city prepares for Halloween, Ratman walks down an alley and a strange shadow appears before him. A voice declaring itself the true son of the emperor of the European Youkai, Backbeard, Backbeard Junior, belongs to the European youkai Bat-cat. Bat-cat asks Ratman to help him collect blood for the ressurection of Backbeard. He has a reason for wanting to achieve something great. Ratman turns him down, but when the huge reward is set in front of him, he changes his mind and offers to help. But there`s no way Ratman will simply do as he`s told and collect blood, is there...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koumori Neko no Halloween Dai Bakuhatsu
こうもり猫のハロウィン大爆発

REGULAR.description:
All around Mana, humans are being stricken with a strange illness that turns them all wrinkly and causes them to fall unconscious. She notices that her classmate Tsutomu is acting oddly, but he keeps telling her to leave him alone. Worried, Mana goes to his apartment building. But, faced with his mother`s piercing gaze, Mana runs away. That night, Mana tells Kitaro about Tsutomu and his mother`s odd behavior. Wondering if it`s somehow connected to the strange illness, Kitaro and Cat-girl go to Tsutomu`s apartment. What they see there, the truth behind the illness is...?!
Source: crunchyroll

Hiderigami loves manga, loves it so much that he`s trying to draw some himself. He takes his finished manuscript to several different publishing companies, but his frightening appearance prevents anyone from accepting it. When he asks Kitaro to go in his place, Kitaro declines. One day, he meets Kakutomi, an associate editor at Weekly Shounen Machine-gun. He does not reject the manuscript on the basis that Hiderigami is a youkai, instead, after evaluating it, he gives Hiderigami guidance on editing it. Hiderigami starts out in high spirits, but every page needs correction. After who knows how many corrections, Hiderigami grows angry. Confronted with the enraged Hiderigami, Kakutomi...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hot Blooded Manga Artist: The Yokai Hiderigami
熱血漫画家 妖怪ひでり神

REGULAR.description:
Something is causing groups of people to mysteriously age, and each of the victims used a rejuvination cream labelled "Beauty B Beauty." To try to bring the situation under control, Kitaro and the others head to the island where the youkai Nuppeppou is manufacturing the cream. But as soon as they land, they hear a strange song and their bodies begin to age. As they stand there bewildered, the Sand-throwing Hag starts behaving strangely. Though she pretends to know nothing, a jar of "Beauty B Beauty" cream falls out of her sleeve! What is Nuppeppou trying to accomplish? And what will happen to the Sand-throwing Hag...?!
Source: crunchyroll

A strange masked youkai is attacking groups of young people who then go missing. Kitaro begins to investigate the string of incidents. Just then, Mana gets caught up in the masked youkai`s attack. Kitaro races in and manages to save Mana, but the other young people are kidnapped. Upon investigating the cell phones left behind at the scene, Cat-girl discovers that each of the victims has a picture of a certain camphor tree. Kitaro and the others head to the tree, but it`s already been cut down. They hear a story from an old man named Kawaji. He says that the youkai is the guardian spirit of the camphor tree and the young people are getting what they deserve. Who is the masked youkai and what is he after...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chain of Hatred: The Yokai Hoko
憎悪の連鎖 妖怪ほうこう

REGULAR.description:
Deep in the mountains to the south, a certain youkai, nicknamed Chin-san, makes up his mind. "I want everyone in the village to be able to live an easy life!" He goes to Japan, but gets apprehended for being completely naked. Kitaro arrives, and Mana, who came with him, hands Chin-san a towel allowing the event to end without incident. He wraps the towel around his waist and looks fervently for somewhere to work. As a result of his hard work, he is engaged at a certain workplace, and both he and Mana rejoice. But the foreigners employed at that new workplace never smile. When he learns why, Chin-san is enraged, and his hand goes to the towel around his waist!? How will this end?! And what is Chin-san`s real name...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 外国人労働者チンさん

REGULAR.description:
One day, a huge eyeball appears near Mt. Fuji. People are shocked and panic. It just floats there, not doing anything, but Kitaro goes to get the situation under control. On his way there, he meets a man named Kadokura. He is researching youkai, specifically Daidarabocchi, and dreams of a world where humans and youkai live together. Kitaro warns him that it`s better if humans and youkai don`t grow too close, but he doesn`t listen. Why is Kadokura so obsessed with Daidarabocchi? And who are the dark hooded figures moving in secret to resurrect Daidarabocchi? What is their aim...?!
Source: crunchyroll

As Christmas approaches, the city is lively, and children are disappearing one after another. On his way to GeGeGe Forest, Souma meets Mana, but in the briefest of moments, Hiroto disappears. The two go looking for him and spot an eerie Santa and, beside him, a mummified Hiroto! They try to escape, but Souma ends up in Santa`s hands. Kitaro narrowly manages to save Mana, but Santa is taken by the police. Kitaro and Cat-gril follow Santa to the police station while Mana heads home alone. But a strange shadow closes in on Mana...!
Source: crunchyroll

Mana is hungry after the school`s opening ceremonies, so when her friend Aya mentions her parents run a cafe, Mana goes over to her house. The cafe is quite impressive, but there are no customers. Mana finds a god of poverty, Bimbougami, on the premises. At first, Aya can`t believe it, but as soon as she sees it, she asks Kitaro to get rid of it. Bimbougami says his presence is maintaining the peace in their family, but Aya refuses to listen. She presses Bimbougami to get out. After Bimbougami leaves, Aya meets a mysterious child in town. Who is this child? And what is the truth behind Bimbougami`s words?!
Source: crunchyroll

On top of getting rejected by Akali Yuriko, she told him he was "flat." Cotton Cloth goes to Kitaro`s house in hopes of some comfort for his broken heart, but Kitaro and Cat-girl are out. "I wish I could find happiness," laments Cotton Cloth with a glass of alcohol in one hand. Just then, Ratman passes by with a new business idea in hand. He proposes that for this new venture he move into BiBiBi House. It`s a share house where youkai and human men and women live together. Cotton Cloth gets his hopes up, thinking he`s sure to find love with someone quickly, and immediately agrees to take part. Will Cotton Cloth`s fated love appear?!
Source: crunchyroll

A client, Youko, says her hands have been "stolen." On her neck are clear marks from where she strangled herself with her own hands. Daddy Eyeball believes it`s the work of Te-no-me, but he has some doubts because Te-no-me is a youkai that usually only plays pranks. A string of suspicious deaths begins. Kitaro realizes that all the victims had their hands "stolen" by Te-no-me just like Youko. In the midst of Kitaro`s confusion, Nurarihyon appears before him. What could Te-no-me`s aim be? And what are Nurarihyon`s motives?
Source: crunchyroll

Kitaro is debuting as an idol?! Mana is shocked when she looks at her phone. Meanwhile, as Kitaro walks leisurely through the city, he is suddenly surrounded by women calling themselves his fans. Kitaro runs away, but the girls chase him to the ends of the earth. When he escapes back home, he finds a mountain of fan mail. Kitaro has been mistaken for the idol G Kitaro! Kitaro senses youkai energy from one of the fan letters. He goes to meet the sender of the letter, and heads to a certain harbor in the middle of the night. What does Kitaro see there? And who is G Kitaro?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アイドル伝説さざえ鬼

REGULAR.description:
A ticket to a play arrives for Kitaro from a man named Hongou, a world-famous director. The play is based on a case Kitaro solved and set in a locale from Hongou`s youth. It`s called "A Foggy Night in Angkor Wat." Fifty-two years ago in Angkor Wat, a young woman would be kidnapped by ghosts every four years. Kitaro went there to resolve the problem and met Hongou and his wife Sara. They laughed, dismissing the incidents as rumors, but that night, Sara was kidnapped by ghosts. Kitaro saved Sara, and the case was closed, but when Kitaro sees Hongou again he tells him something - "The case isn`t over yet..."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angkor Wat no Kiri no Yoru
The Misty Night of Angkor Wat
アンコールワットの霧の夜

REGULAR.description:
Okuda is a television director and things just don`t seem to go well for him at work. Even his own son Yousuke would rather watch videos on the internet than watch the programs he made. Okuda spends every day depressed, shoulders slumped. Ratman brings him material that would make a good story. Okuda goes with Ratman deep into the mountains where Ama-no-jaku, a youkai who loves misfortune, appears before them. He scares Okuda, telling him to film people`s happiness being broken and broadcast it as a program. Okuda doesn`t like doing it, but the show gets high ratings and even his indifferent son Yousuke gets interested in it. His joy is brief as Kitaro appears before Okuda and the others and...!?
Source: crunchyroll

The world ended on February 29th. In the ruins of Tokyo, gravely wounded Cat-girl and Daddy Eyeball are surrounded by people who have turned into vampires. "This is the end, Cat-girl..." Looming over her, a vampiric Kitaro and Mana. Though the people dearest to her are right in front of her, there`s nothing Cat-girl can do. Daddy Eyeball steels his will and summons the Phantom Train. It`s a train that can only be called once, at the cost of Daddy Eyeball`s life. As Cat-girl jumps aboard, Daddy Eyeball says, "Save the world... Save Kitaro, please..." and then he`s engulfed by flames. Where will the Phantom Train take Cat-girl...?!
Source: crunchyroll

In place of Ratman who cancelled at the last minute, Mana joins Kitaro and the others on their trip. They`re headed to an inn exclusive to youkai - the Immortal Onsen. Everyone`s getting the most out of the hot springs, but suddenly, the inn is wrapped in an unsettling noise. The source is underground, the riotous energy from Mt. Fuji. Appeasing it is the job of the owner of the inn, but the current proprietress, Nebutori, is so fat she can`t always do her work. Mana offers to serve in her place. Mana and Kitaro go into the caves of Mt. Fuji, and a huge shadow closes in on them...!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Buraki Fujimi Onsen Bus no Tabi
The Lazy Fujimi Hot Springs Bus Trip
ぶらり不死見温泉バスの旅

REGULAR.description:
The Emperor of the European youkai has been resurrected. "There is only one path left to you. Ruin!" Backbeard has joined forces with Nurarihyon and devoured a city. It has caused humanity`s loathing of youkai to increase. Anti-youkai laws are established, and the government takes out one youkai terrorist after another. Amidst all this, the youkai hatred of humans grows. The wave of feeling swamps the GeGeGe Forest and anti-human youkai begin to appear. In order to prevent humans and youkai from clashing, Kitaro goes to the prime minister, determined to bring her around.
Source: crunchyroll

Despite the efforts of Kitaro and the others, the battle between human and youkai intensifies! Will everything turn out the way Nurarihyon planned?!
Source: crunchyroll

Using Rei and Ibukimaru`s techniques, and Cat-girl`s life, a portal is opened to another dimension. Mana searches for Kitaro, racing into that place which is neither this world nor the other. Finally, she catches sight of Kitaro, but...!? Meanwhile, moment by moment, the earth is pushed closer to the tipping point by Backbeard. How will this war end, and will Kitaro return?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mieteru Sekai ga Subete ja Nai
The World You See Isn`t All There Is
見えてる世界が全てじゃない
目玉おやじのエイプリルフール 実はなかよし編
目玉おやじのエイプリルフール お風呂の夢編
目玉おやじのエイプリルフール なりきり編
TVスポット 15秒 放送前
TVスポット 15秒 放送中

WIKIPEDIA_JP: ゲゲゲの鬼太郎_(テレビアニメ第6シリーズ)
